This section is full of questionable assertions; better to remove all.90086350302:33, 8 June 2019Colipon0→‎Chang'an Avenue: Duan's death is recorded in the "PLA at Tiananmen" article. it is too detailed for a summary here.90076201012:47, 7 June 2019Manabimasu0Deleted current events WP:BOLD. This edit can be undone.90067545400:41, 7 June 2019Ealdgyth1fixed dashes using a script90061783117:48, 6 June 2019Havsjö0Undid revision 900614598 by Jbitte (talk) dont link to the same article you are writing on and youtube(!) links to music videos...90061459817:26, 6 June 2019Jbitte1→‎Impact and legacy: added Arts and Literary section90059843315:43, 6 June 2019Havsjö1→‎Other estimates90058472914:10, 6 June 2019Havsjö1→‎Other estimates90058458514:09, 6 June 2019Havsjö1→‎Other estimates90058413314:06, 6 June 2019Havsjö1→‎Other estimates90057226512:44, 6 June 2019Havsjö1→‎Other estimates90055586110:41, 6 June 2019Havsjö1→‎Death toll90055560910:39, 6 June 2019Havsjö1→‎Other estimates90055549710:38, 6 June 2019Havsjö1→‎Other estimates90055408110:27, 6 June 2019Havsjö190055330110:21, 6 June 2019Havsjö0added casualty estimate, note that even source uses "good friend" in quotations90054862209:41, 6 June 2019Havsjö190046932222:05, 5 June 2019Havsjö190044629818:47, 5 June 2019Mdu020→‎Chinese media: Fixed typo90044126218:07, 5 June 2019Havsjö190044107718:05, 5 June 2019Havsjö0irrelevant detail about what equipment MI6/CIA agents had, add specifics to Operation Yellowbird about. The source to of "organisation on 2 june with moltovs" is NOT mentioned in the source. It also does not report >attacks< until after civilans started getting killed and no "afternoon". This is also a sub-section of the crackdown in the time line, not its own big chapter in the middle of the timeline. Seems your agenda that the students deserved to die shines through again.90043710117:31, 5 June 2019Mularoma0→‎Military action90043670417:27, 5 June 2019Mularoma0→‎Military action90043645317:25, 5 June 2019Mularoma090043572117:19, 5 June 2019Mularoma0→‎Arrests, punishment and evacuations {{Anchor|List of 21 most wanted student leaders}} {{Anchor|Student leaders}}{{Anchor|Obscure dissidents}}90043536917:17, 5 June 2019Mularoma0Protestors attacked on afternoon 3 June, while the PLA clearing the square at 10 PM. And The FinancialTimes wrote "aided by MI6, the UK’s Secret Intelligence Service, and the CIA, according to many accounts, had scrambler devices, infrared signallers, night-vision goggles and weapons"90042512715:51, 5 June 2019Havsjö090042458715:46, 5 June 2019Havsjö0Further, even the financial times only mentions there are accounts, not that its fact, and NOT that it was >provided<. That MI6 used differnt gear in the extraction is superflous detail (and from your motives to paint the protesters a certain way) for this article, that equipment was used by agents helping them to escape the country is understood, details can exists on Operation Yellowbird page. and INDEED the section of protesters attack PLA was ALREADY before the square-clearing section.90042368515:39, 5 June 2019Havsjö0wu renhuas participation in the demonstrations is already covered in the article, also nice how you put his participation in that as an accusation... As for the death toll, >I< was the one who put thousands there before but "yielded" to 2,600 after others changed it. It does not say they PROVIDED weapons (another choice of words that the protesters were CIA-backed rebels). See TALK regarding the 10,000(!) dead number90042312315:34, 5 June 2019ManuRoquette0Death toll has been edited by user:Havsjö. sources exists, in the absence of a consensus previous version restore90042267715:31, 5 June 2019ManuRoquette0Death toll has been edited by user:Havsjö. sources exists, in the absence of a consensus previous version restored90041963515:05, 5 June 2019Mularoma0→‎Deaths in Tiananmen Square itself90041864114:57, 5 June 2019Mularoma0Ad Finacial Times90041797514:52, 5 June 2019Mularoma0Afternoon of 3 June, Protestors attack PLA's troopers, BEFORE PLA clearing the square90041093313:56, 5 June 2019Triggerhippie40→‎top: current tag90040681913:23, 5 June 2019Havsjö1note also how I am not just denying everything, neutral informative things like how the protesters burned/killed PLA-soldiers (after they started shooting them), that there is lacking proof of killings technically "inside the Square" and Operation Yellowbird being done my MI6/CIA. But not extremely slanted communist/socialist sources (or just nu source) as done on some claims here that the students basically "had in coming". or just removing mentions that live ammo was used to shoot civilans90040365512:57, 5 June 2019Havsjö1note also "western journalists" early reports are taken as clear fact when saying something to absolve the Chinese government, but not otherwise, also despite the fact that the soldiers did kill hundreds (even admitted by CCP officals) and were congratulated on their actions afterward, despite being "under orders to not use violence"90040354312:56, 5 June 2019Havsjö0Undid revision 900403442 by Havsjö (talk)90040344212:55, 5 June 2019Havsjö0note also "western journalists" early reports are taken as clear fact when saying something to absolve the chinese government, but not otherwise, also despite the fact that the soldiers did kill hundreds (even admitted by CCP officals) and were congratulated on their actions afterwards90040219712:45, 5 June 2019Havsjö0sources do NOT mention weapons, the sourced MI6/CIA assisted in the evacuation is mentioned. Stop your blatant attempts at white washing this brutal crackdown. Restored timeline after obvious agenda-pusher confused it to push the view that the students deserved to be killed by rioting. Removed reference that soldiers were under orders not to be violent by book that tries to deny the massacre through the ol' "it did happen because nothing happened >in< in the square ;)" in the very
